version_description:
Fixes sound issues and UI improvements.
Adds a read aloud feature to any selectable text.
Adds an alternate display option for Dyslexic users.
Returns Word-of-the-day for iOS9 users.

UI improvements.
Adds upgrade to Plus version.
UI improvements
Major UI improvements
UI fixes

New settings.
More text sizes and pinching support.
Menu position fix
Fix for Example Sentence searching in iOS 10.3
Fixes "Search on open" issue

Supports iPad Pro screen sizes and split-screen.
iPhoneX support.

Improved iPhone X support.
IAP fixes.

Movie fix for iOS11.
Word-of-the-Day fix for iOS11.
SNS support update.
Evernote 3.0 support.
iOS support

Layout fixes.
New iPhoneX support.
Hardware keyboard support.
Example Sentence Search fixes

UI improvements.
A new "Today" widget.
Also a "Share" extension.
UI improvement for iPad Pro users

12.9 inch 3rd Generation iPad layout fixes.
iPhone X layout fixes.
iOS13 support
Fixes for iPhone Xs layout
Fixes iPhone X & 11 layout issues
DarkMode support

Fixes the black background in Large and Huge font settings when NOT in DarkMode.
Support for HW keyboard and iPad floating keyboard.

UI fixes.
DarkMode setting.
Adds multi-level "Back" button
Improves downloads

Adds a setting for high-quality sound downloads for example sentences. (The default is off. Previously it was on.)
Leaving it off will speed up download times for mobile WiFi and non-broadband users.
(Even setting it on, downloads over 3G will still be the smaller size -just as before.)

Repairs "Academic Word List".
UI fixes.
Faster display.
Fixes issue on iPad for some users.Fixes issue on iPad for some users.

iPhone 12 support.
UI fixes.

Fixes scrolling in "About".
Reenables select text in definitions. (Long tap and drag to make selections)
Fixes PDF display and printing in "Teacher Resources".
Fixes to Settings.
Fixes for lists on devices without a Home Button

Major update.
• Adds rotation for iPhone users. (can be locked in Settings)
• Adds online searching for rare words.
• Adds a history feature for the "Share" module -so you can keep a record of words you want to look at later.
• Now has multiple word sets for the Word-a-Day feature. -select sets for TOEIC® or TOEFL®, among others
• Adds "Longman Communication 9000"
• Wide-ranging UI improvements.

Fixes crashing issue for iOS9 users.
Fixes issues with text selection.
Improved "Collapsed Mode".
Adds support for landscape mode on more iPhones.
Adds support for landscape mode on more iPhones.
UI improvements.
UI improvements.
Fixes SlideOver on iPad Pro 11-inch and more.
Fixes SlideOver on iPad Pro 11-inch and more.
Major update to phrasal verb indexing.
Major update to phrasal verb indexing.

Sounds no longer stops music playing in the background.
Fixes for pre-iOS 13 devices.
